title: 1.16 UUID控制尖牙可伤害对象
author: 阡喏
txt_content: 1.16UUIDMost和Least好像没了，所有怎么使召唤出来的尖牙不会伤害到自己

replies.author: ⊙u⊙
replies.txt_content:
是Owner吧？

data modify entity 尖牙 Owner set from entity @p UUID

replies.author: xwjcool123
replies.txt_content:
合并为UUID标签了，拆成四段构成一个整型数组
类似这样：UUID: [I; 1234, 5678, 9012, 3456]

replies.author: 阡喏
replies.txt_content:
xwjcool123 发表于 2020-6-24 22:17
合并为UUID标签了，拆成四段构成一个整型数组
类似这样：UUID:
这样的咋改,data modify entity 尖牙 UUID set from entity @p UUID好像莫得用
是Owner吧？ data modify entity 尖牙
